node.name: Turmeric SOA - Eclipse Extras
node.shortdescription:
This feature adds additional editing support for the eBay Open Source Turmeric SOA project's configuration files. Additonal support includes:

* Content Assistance for all Configuration files, including GlobalServiceConfig, ServiceConfig, TypeLibraries, and ErrorLibrary.
* Hover Help with documentation for most elements.
* Makes a XML Catalog entry available to the WTP XML Catalog.

Future work will provide more support for pipeline configuration, transport and service level handlers.

The project is looking for contributions, please feel free to fork the project on github.
node.body:
This feature adds additional editing support for the eBay Open Source Turmeric SOA project's configuration files. Additonal support includes:

* Content Assistance for all Configuration files, including GlobalServiceConfig, ServiceConfig, TypeLibraries, and ErrorLibrary.
* Hover Help with documentation for most elements.
* Makes a XML Catalog entry available to the WTP XML Catalog.

Future work will provide more support for pipeline configuration, transport and service level handlers.

The project is looking for contributions, please feel free to fork the project on github.
